1634306647_1CN7STVMU29Rme1tgVRRPj3ZA3H7m.body:
I got $10,000 (I would say cash... But figure you would prefer it in bit coin)  for this project, you guys already built most of what I was going to spend a hundred k to build.

If I can talk to the dev team I can hire you to finish this project, I got the wire frame and everything laid out I just need a response from the people who will do the work.

Talk to me people, lets get this done, should take maybe a month or 2 to finish everything with what you already have.

=.=

Step 1. Each user has a unique ID (see block chain) and can have what ever username they want that isn't taken (tied to block chain).

Step 2. Each users app has its own private list (total decentralization) which tracks each known user and the last know IP or Phone number the user could be reached at. (yes we are talking stone age simple by directly pinging a users IP).

Step 3. When users interact app to app, their apps trade their private user lists. If anything is found different, they update (add new users / test last known IP's/Phones to see which is current and update).

Like, guys I got this all worked out, was about to drop 100K to make this but here you all are with most of it done, I can fund the completion of ZeroNet. 

How do I reach the devs or people active on this project (I am not going to give you money and say "have fun" I know what needs to be done and will pay for it)
